name: Stoni
description:
Description

All the unicorns have been turned to stone. Life as they knew it, at least what they can remember, has vanished. Thankfully, they still have their magic; and with magic, comes the hope of finding a cure. Stonicorn is a 2D puzzle/platformer where walking and jumping are out of the question. You must expand your teleportation and time-travel abilities in order to save unicorns everywhere from a fate worse than death: infinite boredom.

Traverse 1 insanely detailed world, play as all of the available 1 characters to play, meet all of the 1 NPCs to talk to, and gain all of the 1 new abilities! 

Haha no seriously, this is only the demo version of the intended full game. The full game will have 8 detailed worlds, several NPCs, and 6 new abilities!

Gameplay Facts:

Supported Devices: Touch and Mouse.
Keyboard and Controller support coming eventually.

Touch input involves:
  • Tapping the screen
  • Rapidly Tapping the screen
  • Touching and Holding on the screen
  • Dragging on the screen
  • 2-Finger Pinching on the screen
Mouse input involves:
  • Clicking the Left Mouse Button (LMB)
  • Rapidly Clicking LMB
  • Clicking and Holding LMB
  • Moving the mouse while Holding LMB
  • Using the scroll wheel
Other Facts:
  • Remappable Controls: Not yet
  • Hands Required: 1
  • Est. Play Time: 15 min
  • Est. Bonus Time: 2 hrs
  • Assist Mode: Not yet.
  • Speedrun Mode: Not yet
  • Autosave: Yes
  • Easy Device Switch: Yes
  • Subtitles: Yes
  • Voice Acting: Yes
